generated_description: pingyao yan family homestay is a hotel located in pingyao, shanxi, china. the hotel offers 17 rooms and is situated 450 feet from qingxu temple. it features wi-fi throughout the property and some rooms with sound-proofed windows and separate bathrooms. the hotel is located in the pingyao ancient city district and is within walking distance of the pingyao county government museum and er lang temple. the hotel provides amenities such as a dining area, parking, and 24-hour services.
